transcript: the most expensive thing that all of us are paying for is the information that we don't know I heard this close years ago and this guy got on stage and he was like Hey ma'am she was like how much do you make she was like fifty thousand dollars fifty thousand dollars on the Whiteboard and then you wrote a million dollars on top of the 50 000 and he subtracted it it's at 950 000. he said you pay life 950 000 every single year for not knowing how to make a million dollars a year the biggest debt all of us pay is ignorance
